parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To flee, escape, shun. Apparently a primary verb; to run away; by implication, to shun; by analogy, to vanish.
Associated with youth, youthful, juvenile. From the comparative of neos; appertaining to younger persons, i.e. Juvenile.
Desire, eagerness for, inordinate desire, lust. From epithumeo; a longing.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: (a) To call (name) by a supplementary (additional, alternative) name, (b) mid: To call upon, appeal to, address.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
